Raker Komisi III : Jaksa Agung Kalem, Anggota DPR Saling Serang
07 Nov 2019, 17:31 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Raker Komisi III : Jaksa Agung Kalem, Anggota DPR Saling Serang

KBRN, Jakarta : Harmoni Rapat Kerja (Raker) Komisi III DPR RI dengan Jaksa Agung ST Burhanuddin mendadak berubah jadi ajang adu argumentasi antara sesama Anggota Komisi III, yakni Benny Kabur Harman dari Fraksi Partai Demokrat dengan Taufik Basari, Fraksi Partai Nasional Demokrat (NasDem).Benny menyalakan 'api' dengan menyinggung ST Burhanuddin sebagai adik kandung politisi PDI Perjuangan TB Hasanuddin. Bahkan Benny sampai masuk ke area terlalu dalam dengan menceritakan pengalaman dimana ia sempat mencari kebenaran dugaan hubungan darah tersebut."Tadi dikatakan Bapak Jaksa Agung itu adik sahabat saya Bapak TB Hasanuddin. Saya tanyakan juga ke temen-teman yang lain apakah betul atau tidak. Semua menjawab betul sekali dan jawabannya dengan penuh kebanggaan," ujar Benny, di Gedung Nusantara II, Kompleks Parlemen Senayan Jakarta, seperti hasil transkrip tangkap audio RRI, Kamis (7/11/2019).Benny menyoroti perihal Jaksa Agung sebelumnya, HM Prasetyo, yang merupakan kader partai politik yaitu NasDem. Seolah memercikkan bensin ke bara api, Benny lantas meminta Burhanuddin untuk profesional meski secara nyata memang punya kakak seorang politisi PDI Perjuangan."Dulu Jaksa Agung (HM Prasetyo) jelas-jelas partai politik, dan menjadikan kejaksaan (sebagai) alat politik. Saya mohon bapak Jaksa Agung (ST Burhanuddin) mencatat ini, jaga netralitas, profesionalitas, serta jagalah keadilan," kata Benny.Tersiram bensin, sontak api membesar seketika. Taufik Basari langsung interupsi ke pimpinan rapat.Â "Interupsi pimpinan," teriak Taufik.Melihat gelagat mulai 'panas', Herman Hery coba meneduhkan suasana dengan meminta Taufik memberi kesempatan Benny menyelesaikan pemaparannya."Sebentar ya. Biar dia selesai dulu," jawab Herman Hery.Benny lanjut berbicara. Menurutnya, secara pribadi ia tidak menyebut nama 'HM Prasetyo', walaupun menyebutkan 'jaksa agung yang dulu' (artinya HM Prasetyo). Oleh karena itu, Benny meminta anggota yang tersinggung untuk menjelaskan."Saya nggak menyebut siapa-siapa. Dia (Taufik) sendiri yang menganggap itu, saya tahu saya tidak mengungkapkan itu. Tapi (jika) ada yang merasa (tersinggung) silakan," ujar Benny.Seperti dilansir detikcom, usai Benny menyelesaikan kalimatnya, Taufik langsung menyambar. Dia lalu memberi catatan untuk Anggota Komisi III supaya tidak bicara mengenai orang perorangan, atau mengarah ke satu orang. Taufik kemudian mempertanyakan kenapa Jaksa Agung sebelumnya dibahas saat ini, padahal ini merupakan Raker dengan Jaksa Agung baru."Saya hanya ingin memberi catatan agar jangan tendensius. Ketika menyampaikan sesuatu hal yang menuduh (orang lain) di sini terkait dengan partai politik misalnya, itu kan kemarin sepanjang periode jaksa agung kemarin sudah terbuka seluas-luasnya. Jika ingin mempertanyakan, jika ada masalah, jika ada sesuatu hal, itu bisa ditanyakan pada waktu itu. Jadi apabila kemarin tidak ada persoalan, kenapa kemudian dipertanyakan sekarang? Itu saja pimpinan," tegas Taufik.Tapi Benny nampak belum puas. Saat Taufik menyudahi interupsinya, Benny langsung menimpali dengan memberikan sejumlah dalih buat Taufik."Saya tidak menuduh siapapun atau partai politik. Tetapi saya ingatkan dulu ada orang partai politik yang menjadi Jaksa Agung dan menggunakan institusi itu (sebagai) alat politiknya. Saya tidak sebut partai tertentu. Jadi, kalau ada yang tersinggung, coba sebut siapa (yang dimaksudkan) itu. Sebab Jaksa Agung dulu itu ada dari PBB, Golkar, dan PPP," pungkasnya. (Sumber: Jorike Fitri/RRI-PRO3)

Commission III Coordination Meeting: Attorney General Kalem, Member of the House of Representatives
Nov 7 2019, 17:31 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Commission III Coordination Meeting: Attorney General Kalem, Member of the House of Representatives

KBRN, Jakarta: The Harmony of the House of Representatives Commission III Working Meeting (Raker) with Attorney General ST Burhanuddin suddenly turned into an arena for argument between fellow Commission III members, namely Benny Kabur Harman from the Democratic Party Faction with Taufik Basari, Democratic National Party (NasDem) Faction Benny lit a 'fire' by referring to ST Burhanuddin as the biological brother of the PDI-P politician TB Hasanuddin. Benny even went into the area too deep by telling the experience where he had sought the truth of the alleged blood relationship. "Earlier said the Attorney General was the friend of my friend Mr. TB Hasanuddin. I also asked other friends whether true or not. All answered very well and the answer with great pride, "said Benny, in Nusantara II Building, Senayan Parliament Complex Jakarta, as the results of the RRI audio capture transcript, Thursday (11/07/2019). Benny highlighted the matter of the Attorney General, HM Prasetyo, who is a cadre of political parties namely NasDem. As if sprinkling gasoline on embers, Benny then asked Burhanuddin to be professional even though he actually had the brother of a PDI-P politician. "Attorney General (HM Prasetyo) was clearly a political party, and made the prosecutor's office (a) political tool. The Attorney General (ST Burhanuddin) noted this, maintain neutrality, professionalism, and guard justice, "said Benny. Gasoline-sprinkled, the fire suddenly enlarged instantly. Taufik Basari directly interrupted the leadership of the meeting. "The interruption of the leadership," Taufik shouted. Seeing the signs began to 'heat up', Herman Hery tried to calm the atmosphere by asking Taufik to give Benny the opportunity to finish his presentation. According to him, he personally did not mention the name 'HM Prasetyo', despite mentioning 'the former attorney general' (meaning HM Prasetyo). Therefore, Benny asked the offended member to explain. "I did not mention anyone. He (Taufik) himself considered it, I know I did not disclose it. But (if) anyone felt (offended) please," said Benny. As reported by AFP, after Benny finished his sentence, Taufik immediately grabbed. He then gave a note to Members of Commission III so as not to talk about individuals, or point to one person. Taufik then questioned why the Attorney General was previously discussed at this time, even though this was a meeting with the new Attorney General. "I just wanted to make a note so as not to be tendentious. yesterday during the attorney general's period yesterday was open as wide as possible. If you want to question, if there is a problem, if there is something, it can be asked at that time. So if yesterday there was no problem, why then questioned now? Taufik. But Benny seems not satisfied. When Taufik ended his interruption, Benny immediately chimed in by giving a number of excuses for Taufik. "So if someone is offended, try to say who (intended). Because the Attorney General used to come from the United Nations, Golkar and PPP," he concluded. (Source: Jorike Fitri / RRI-PRO3)
